name: Kingdom of Loathing (KoL) – How Full Will I Get?
description: Places a fullness indicator next to each food item in your inventory. June 24, 2010 – removed spaghetti with rock-balls, gloomy black mushroom, oily golden mushroom, spooky frank, and flask of peppermint oil; added cupcake-in-a-cup, walrus ice cream, beautiful soup, Humpty Dumplings, Lobster qua Grill, yellow matter custard, rook cookie, bishop cookie, knight cookie, king cookie, raisin, squirmy violent party snack, and pawn cookie April 19, 2010 – creation date
